module_restrictions: This exchange program is open only to students from the University Scholars Program. USP students from all Faculties will apply for exchange at Carleton through USP.
visa_info: All students are advised to apply for the necessary visa immediately after they receive the official offer letter/email from their host university. Some visa application processes can take up to 2 months to process.
accommodations_info: International exchange students are required to live in one of the on-campus residential halls.
university_description: Carleton College is a liberal arts college in Northfield, Minnesota, USA.
university_address: One North College Street, Northfield MN 55057, United States of America
location_description: Northfield is a small city of just over 20,000 residents that is home to Carleton College and St. Olaf College.
